rule: Each part of speech tag in the response must exactly match one of the tags listed in the predefined list without any alterations in spelling, case, or punctuation.
output:
CC: Coordinating conjunction
JJ: Adjective 
VB: Verb
complianceText:
The chatbot's output includes both the part-of-speech tag and its corresponding description (e.g., "CC: Coordinating conjunction") instead of returning only the tag as specified in the description.
